original_text: Then I arose in the night, I and a few men with me. And I told no one what my God had put into my heart to do for Jerusalem. There was no animal with me but the one on which I rode.
korean_text: 내 하나님께서 예루살렘을 위해 무엇을 할 것인지 내 마음에 주신 것을 내가 아무에게도 말하지 아니하고 밤에 일어나 몇몇 사람과 함께 나갈새 내가 탄 짐승 외에는 다른 짐승이 없더라

sentences.original_text: Then I arose in the night
I and a few men with me
sentences.korean_translation: 나와 나와 함께 한 몇 사람이었더라

sentences.original_text: what my God had put into my heart
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 하나님이 내 마음에 두신 것을

sentences.original_text: There was no animal with me
but the one on which I rode
